extendedIngredients.name: bbq sauce
extendedIngredients.originalString: Garnish: additional BBQ sauce, ranch salad dressing

recipes.title: Crock Pot Freezer Packs: BBQ Ranch Chicken Buns

winePairing.pairingText: Chicken works really well with Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, and Sauvignon Blanc. White meat is typically paired with white wine as to not overpower the flavor of the meat, so chardonnay and sauvignon blanc are safe choices. Chicken prepared with a tomato sauce or certainly a red wine sauce can and should be served with a red like a pinot noir. The District 7 Estate Chardonnay with a 5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 18 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: District 7 Estate Chardonnay
productMatches.description: Our 2012 vintage has aromas of tropical fruit and butterscotch that lead into a lively blend of pear, pineapple and citrus flavors

recipes.instructions: Label your bags with the date and recipe name.Place 3 chicken breasts in each bag.Sprinkle a generous amount of season salt in each bag.Pour a generous 1/2 cup of bbq sauce in each bag.Press out all the air in each bag in seal.Lay flat in your freezer and freeze.When you are ready to cook, thaw overnight or in a water bath, place freezer pack contents in slow cooker for 5-6 hours on low.ORPlace freezer pack contents in slow cooker frozen, cover and cook on low for 6-7 hours.Place your cooked chicken in a large bowl and shred with two forks.Serve shredded chicken on a bun with a drizzle of BBQ sauce and ranch dressing.

steps.step: Label your bags with the date and recipe name.
Place 3 chicken breasts in each bag.Sprinkle a generous amount of season salt in each bag.

Pour a generous 1/2 cup of bbq sauce in each bag.Press out all the air in each bag in seal.Lay flat in your freezer and freeze.When you are ready to cook, thaw overnight or in a water bath, place freezer pack contents in slow cooker for 5-6 hours on low.OR
Place freezer pack contents in slow cooker frozen, cover and cook on low for 6-7 hours.
Place your cooked chicken in a large bowl and shred with two forks.
Serve shredded chicken on a bun with a drizzle of BBQ sauce and ranch dressing.
